SELECT top ${size} id, node_code, unit_code, unit_code_type, unit_code_group, STUFF(( SELECT ',' + water_meter_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_meter WHERE use_water_unit_id = temp_row.id FOR XML PATH ( '' )), 1, 1, '' ) AS water_meter_code, responsibility_code, unit_name, industry, industryName, contacts, mobile_number, phone_number, save_unit_type, save_unit_time, water_balance_type, water_balance_time, unit_address, zip_name, zip_address, department, invoice_unit_name, area_country, gisX, gisY, imain, abnormal, abnormal_cause, remark, CASE WHEN signed IS NULL OR signed = '' THEN '否' ELSE '是' END AS signedEntrust, bank_of_deposit, bank_account, people_bank_pay_sys_number, agreement_number, entrust_unit_name, focus_user_remark, other_bank FROM ( SELECT row_number ( ) OVER ( ORDER BY a.unit_code_type ,cast(SUBSTRING(a.unit_code,7,10) as INTEGER) ) AS rownumber, a.id, a.node_code, a.unit_code, a.unit_code_type, a.unit_code_group, a.responsibility_code, a.unit_name, d.id AS industry, d.industryName, b.contacts, b.mobile_number, b.phone_number, save_unit_type, save_unit_time, water_balance_type, water_balance_time, unit_address, zip_name, zip_address, department, invoice_unit_name, area_country, gisX, gisY, imain, abnormal, abnormal_cause, remark, signed, bank_of_deposit, bank_account, people_bank_pay_sys_number, agreement_number, entrust_unit_name, focus_user_remark, other_bank FROM (select id, industry, node_code, unit_code, unit_code_type, unit_code_group, responsibility_code, unit_name, save_unit_type, save_unit_time, water_balance_type, water_balance_time, unit_address, zip_name, zip_address, department, invoice_unit_name, area_country, gisX, gisY, imain, abnormal, abnormal_cause, remark from t_w_use_water_unit where deleted= '0' AND node_code=#{nodeCode} ) AS a inner join ( SELECT unit_type_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_role WHERE person_id =#{userId} group by unit_type_code ) as f on a.unit_code_type=f.unit_type_code
left join ( select use_water_unit_id,contacts,mobile_number,phone_number from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where deleted='0' and main='1' ) as b on a.id =b.use_water_unit_id
left join ( select use_water_unit_Id,bank_of_deposit,bank_account,signed,people_bank_pay_sys_number,agreement_number,entrust_unit_name,focus_user_remark,other_bank from t_w_bank where deleted='0' and main='1' and signed='1' ) as c on c.use_water_unit_Id=a.id left join ( select id,industry_name as industryName from t_w_quota_info ) as d on d.id=a.industry
inner join ( select use_water_unit_Id from t_w_bank where deleted='0' and signed=#{signed} group by use_water_unit_Id ) as e on e.use_water_unit_Id=a.id
WHERE 1=1
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_meter where water_meter_code like '%${waterMeterCode}%' )
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where mobile_number like '%${mobileNumber}%' and deleted='0')
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where contacts like '%${contacts}%' and deleted='0')
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_Id as id from t_w_bank where bank_account like '%${bankAccount}%' and deleted='0')
and a.abnormal =#{abnormal}
and a.unit_code like '%${unitCode}%'
and a.unit_name like '%${unitName}%'
and a.unit_code_type like '%${unitCodeType}%'
and a.responsibility_code like '%${responsibilityCode}%'
and industry =#{industryId}
) temp_row WHERE rownumber > ( ( #{current}- 1 ) * #{size} );

SELECT count(1) FROM (select id, abnormal, unit_code, unit_name, unit_code_type, responsibility_code, industry from t_w_use_water_unit where deleted= '0' ) AS a inner join ( SELECT unit_type_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_role WHERE person_id =#{userId} group by unit_type_code ) as f on a.unit_code_type=f.unit_type_code
inner join ( select use_water_unit_Id from t_w_bank where deleted='0' and signed=#{signed} group by use_water_unit_Id ) as e on e.use_water_unit_Id=a.id
WHERE 1=1
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_meter where water_meter_code like '%${waterMeterCode}%' )
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where mobile_number like '%${mobileNumber}%' and deleted='0')
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where contacts like '%${contacts}%' and deleted='0')
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_Id as id from t_w_bank where bank_account like '%${bankAccount}%' and deleted='0')
and a.abnormal =#{abnormal}
and a.unit_code like '%${unitCode}%'
and a.unit_name like '%${unitName}%'
and a.unit_code_type like '%${unitCodeType}%'
and a.responsibility_code like '%${responsibilityCode}%'
and industry =#{industryId}

SELECT a.id, a.node_code, a.unit_code, a.unit_code_type, a.unit_code_group, a.unit_name, d.id AS industry, d.industryName, save_unit_type, save_unit_time, water_balance_type, water_balance_time, unit_address, zip_name, zip_address, department, invoice_unit_name, area_country, gisX, gisY, imain, abnormal, abnormal_cause, remark FROM (select id, industry, node_code, unit_code, unit_code_type, unit_code_group, responsibility_code, unit_name, save_unit_type, save_unit_time, water_balance_type, water_balance_time, unit_address, zip_name, zip_address, department, invoice_unit_name, area_country, gisX, gisY, imain, abnormal, abnormal_cause, remark from t_w_use_water_unit where deleted= '0' and id=#{id} AND node_code=#{nodeCode} ) AS a inner join ( SELECT unit_type_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_role WHERE person_id =#{userId} group by unit_type_code ) as f on a.unit_code_type=f.unit_type_code left join ( select id,industry_name as industryName from t_w_quota_info ) as d on d.id=a.industry

select t1.id, t1.water_meter_code, t3.use_year, now_price, node_code, is_warning, caliber, sector, waterNumber from (select id,water_meter_code from t_w_use_water_unit_meter where use_water_unit_id =#{id}) t1 left join ( SELECT water_meter_code, SUM( january_count + february_count + march_count + april_count + may_count + june_count + july_count + august_count + september_count + october_count + november_count + december_count ) as waterNumber FROM t_w_water_month_use_data GROUP BY water_meter_code
) t2 on t1.water_meter_code=t2.water_meter_code inner join ( select water_meter_code, use_year, now_price, node_code, is_warning, caliber, sector FROM t_w_water_month_use_data ) t3 on t1.water_meter_code=t3.water_meter_code inner join ( select water_meter_code, max(use_year) as use_year from t_w_water_month_use_data GROUP BY water_meter_code ) t4 on t3.water_meter_code=t4.water_meter_code and t3.use_year =t4.use_year ORDER BY waterNumber DESC;

select id,bank_of_deposit,bank_account,people_bank_pay_sys_number,agreement_number,entrust_unit_name,focus_user_remark,other_bank,main,signed from t_w_bank where use_water_unit_id =#{id} and deleted='0' order By main desc
select id,contacts,phone_number,mobile_number,main from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where use_water_unit_id =#{id} and deleted='0' order by main desc
select id,file_name,file_path,deleted from t_file where business_id =#{id} and deleted='0' order by create_time desc

SELECT id,industry,sub_industry,product,quota_unit,quota_value,amount,advance_value,common_value,quota_rate, (select industry_name as subIndustryName from t_w_quota_info where id=a.sub_industry)as subIndustryName, (select industry_name as productName from t_w_quota_info where id=a.product) as productName FROM t_w_use_water_quota as a WHERE use_water_unit_id = #{id} ORDER BY create_time desc
select id,before_name,after_name,modify_time,modify_person from t_w_use_water_unit_modify where use_water_unit_id=#{id} order by modify_time desc

select b.agreement_number as agreementNumber, sBankName = '建行一行', sBankNum = '105651002108', sUnitName = '成都市节约用水监管事务中心', sBankAccount = '51001416108050735062', b.bank_of_deposit as bankOfDeposit, b.people_bank_pay_sys_number as peopleBankPaySysNumber, b.other_bank as bankCode, CASE b.entrust_unit_name WHEN '' THEN a.unit_name WHEN NULL THEN a.unit_name ELSE b.entrust_unit_name END AS accountUnitName, b.bank_account as bankAccount from (select id, unit_name from t_w_use_water_unit where deleted='0' and node_code=#{nodeCode}) as a inner join (select use_water_unit_Id, agreement_number, bank_of_deposit, people_bank_pay_sys_number, other_bank, entrust_unit_name, bank_account from t_w_bank where deleted='0' and signed='0' and bank_account is not null and bank_account !='' ) as b on a.id =b.use_water_unit_Id

select * from ( select use_water_unit_Id, bank_account as bankAccount, bank_of_deposit as bankOfDeposit, people_bank_pay_sys_number as peopleBankPaySysNumber, agreement_number as agreementNumber, other_bank as otherBank from t_w_bank where deleted='0' and signed='1' ) as a inner join ( select id from t_w_use_water_unit as b where deleted='0' and node_code=#{nodeCode} ) as b on a.use_water_unit_Id =b.id

SELECT distinct CASE a.deleted WHEN 0 THEN '新增' WHEN 1 THEN '注销' END AS userType, unit_code as unitCode, unit_name as unitName, unit_address as unitAddress , contacts, mobileNumber, remark = '' , deleted FROM t_w_use_water_unit as a left join (SELECT use_water_unit_id,contacts,mobile_number as mobileNumber from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where main='1' ) as b on a.id =b.use_water_unit_id where a.node_code=#{nodeCode} and a.unit_code_type in (select unit_type_code as unit_code_type from t_w_use_water_unit_role where person_id=#{userId}) ORDER BY a.deleted

SELECT a.id, a.unit_code as unitCode, a.unit_code_type as unitCodeType, a.unit_code_group as unitCodeGroup, STUFF(( SELECT ',' + water_meter_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_meter WHERE use_water_unit_id=a.id and node_code=#{nodeCode} FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '' ) as waterMeterCode, a.responsibility_code as responsibilityCode, a.unit_name as unitName, d.id as industry, d.industryName, b.contacts, b.mobile_number as mobileNumber, b.phone_number as phoneNumber, save_unit_type as saveUnitType, unit_address as unitAddress, zip_name as zipName, zip_address as zipAddress, department, invoice_unit_name as invoiceUnitName, area_country as areaCountry, gisX , gisY , imain, abnormal , abnormal_cause as abnormalCause, case signed when '1' then '1' when '0' then '0' else '0'end as signed, bank_of_deposit as bankOfDeposit, bank_account as bankAccount, responsibility_code as responsibilityCode, people_bank_pay_sys_number as peopleBankPaySysNumber, agreement_number as agreementNumber, entrust_unit_name as entrustUnitName, focus_user_remark as focusUserRemark, other_bank as otherBank FROM (select id, industry, node_code, unit_code, unit_code_type, unit_code_group, responsibility_code, unit_name, save_unit_type, save_unit_time, water_balance_type, water_balance_time, unit_address, zip_name, zip_address, department, invoice_unit_name, area_country, gisX, gisY, imain, abnormal, abnormal_cause, remark from t_w_use_water_unit where deleted= '0' AND node_code=#{nodeCode} ) AS a inner join ( SELECT unit_type_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_role WHERE person_id =#{userId} group by unit_type_code ) as f on a.unit_code_type=f.unit_type_code
left join ( select use_water_unit_id,contacts,mobile_number,phone_number from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where deleted='0' and main='1' ) as b on a.id =b.use_water_unit_id
left join ( select use_water_unit_Id,bank_of_deposit,bank_account,signed,people_bank_pay_sys_number,agreement_number,entrust_unit_name,focus_user_remark,other_bank from t_w_bank where deleted='0' and main='1' and signed='1' ) as c on c.use_water_unit_Id=a.id left join ( select id,industry_name as industryName from t_w_quota_info ) as d on d.id=a.industry
inner join ( select use_water_unit_Id from t_w_bank where deleted='0' and signed=#{signed} group by use_water_unit_Id ) as e on e.use_water_unit_Id=a.id
WHERE 1=1
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_meter where water_meter_code like '%${waterMeterCode}%' )
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where mobile_number like '%${mobileNumber}%' and deleted='0')
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where contacts like '%${contacts}%' and deleted='0')
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_Id as id from t_w_bank where bank_account like '%${bankAccount}%' and deleted='0')
and a.abnormal =#{abnormal}
and a.unit_code like '%${unitCode}%'
and a.unit_name like '%${unitName}%'
and a.unit_code_type like '%${unitCodeType}%'
and a.responsibility_code like '%${responsibilityCode}%'
and industry =#{industryId}

select t1.*, t2.industry_name as industryName from ( select id, industry, unit_name as unitName, unit_code as unitCode, unit_address as unitAddress, zip_name as zipName, zip_address as zipAddress, unit_code_group as unitCodeGroup, unit_code_type as unitCodeType from t_w_use_water_unit where deleted='0' and unit_code=#{unitCode} and node_code=#{nodeCode} ) as t1 left join ( select id,industry_name from t_w_quota_info ) as t2 on t2.id=t1.industry

SELECT unit_name AS unitName, unit_code AS unitCode FROM t_w_water_use_pay_info t1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT unit_type_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_role WHERE person_id = #{userId} ) t2 ON SUBSTRING ( t1.unit_code, 5, 2 ) = t2.unit_type_code AND t1.node_code = #{nodeCode} AND ( unit_name LIKE '%${unitName}%' AND actual_amount LIKE '%${actualAmount}%') GROUP BY unit_code,unit_name
SELECT unit_code_type from t_w_use_water_unit where node_code=#{nodeCode} GROUP BY unit_code_type order by unit_code_type

select t1.id, year=#{year}, unit_code , unit_name , unit_address, industry_name from ( select id, unit_code , unit_name , unit_address, industry from t_w_use_water_unit where id=#{id} ) as t1 left join ( select id, industry_name from t_w_quota_info ) as t2 on t2.id=t1.industry
select contacts, mobile_number, phone_number, main from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where deleted='0' and use_water_unit_id=#{id} order by main desc

select yearAndMonth=cast (use_year as varchar(10))+'年'+cast (use_month as varchar(10))+'月', t1.water_meter_code, ROUND(price,2) as price, sector, water_number, water_use_kinds from t_w_water_use_data t1 inner join ( select water_meter_code from t_w_use_water_unit_meter where use_water_unit_id=#{id} ) t2 on t1.water_meter_code=t2.water_meter_code where use_year=#{year}

select top 20 id, unit_code as unitCode, unit_name as unitName from ( select id, unit_code, unit_name, unit_code_type from t_w_use_water_unit where deleted='0' and node_code=#{nodeCode} )as t1 inner join ( SELECT unit_type_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_role WHERE person_id =#{userId} group by unit_type_code ) as t2 on t1.unit_code_type=t2.unit_type_code order by unit_code
